A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The visuals were great\, couple funny parts but on the whole it was a disappointment.  Wasted characters\, plot holes and really stretching belief is required (gravity in space?!?!)   Essentially I felt insulted as a Star Wars fan. I am really surprised critics are giving such good reviews\, just from the predictive movie traps and pandering it does it should get a lower rating.
